```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(patchwork)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
# Read in '.xlsx' data  
amphibians <- read_excel(here("data","sierra_amphibians.xlsx"))

# Part 1
#Wrangle data to include only mountain yellow-legged frogs. Exclude 'EggMass' life stage. Select life stage, and date

ramu_amphibians <- amphibians %>% 
  filter(amphibian_species == "RAMU") %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(survey_date)) %>%
  select(amphibian_life_stage, date, amphibian_state, amphibian_number) %>% 
  filter(amphibian_life_stage %in% c("Adult","SubAdult","Tadpole")) %>% 
  mutate(year = year(date)) %>% 
  group_by(year)
```
